/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their architecture hinting at the blend of traditional and modern styles that are characteristic of Beijing. Cars are parked neatly along the side of the road, adding a touch of everyday life to the scene. In the distance, a construction site bustles with activity, a testament to the city's continuous growth and development. The sky above is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The colors in the image are mostly muted, creating a calm and serene atmosphere.
